      Delivers error to callback on the next game tick (on the PlayN thread).

    • Uses of Callback in playn.core.util

      Classes in playn.core.util that implement Callback 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  Callback.Chain<T>
      A callback that chains failure to the supplied delegate callback.
      class  CallbackList<T>
      Collects a list of callbacks, and eases the process of propagating success or failure to all listed callbacks.
      Methods in playn.core.util that return types with arguments of type Callback 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static <T> List<Callback<? super T>> Callbacks.createAdd(List<Callback<? super T>> list, Callback<? super T> callback)
      Adds callback to list, creating list if it is null, and returning (the possibly newly created) list.
      static <T> List<Callback<? super T>> Callbacks.dispatchFailureClear(List<Callback<? super T>> list, Throwable cause)
      Dispatches onSuccess(T) to all callbacks in list using result.
      static <T> List<Callback<? super T>> Callbacks.dispatchSuccessClear(List<Callback<? super T>> list, T result)
      Dispatches onSuccess(T) to all callbacks in list using result.
      Methods in playn.core.util with parameters of type Callback 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      CallbackList<T> CallbackList.add(Callback<T> callback)
      Adds the supplied callback to the list.
      static <T> CallbackList<T> CallbackList.create(Callback<T> callback)
      Creates a callback list, populated with the supplied callback.
      static <T> List<Callback<? super T>> Callbacks.createAdd(List<Callback<? super T>> list, Callback<? super T> callback)
      Adds callback to list, creating list if it is null, and returning (the possibly newly created) list.
      void CallbackList.remove(Callback<T> callback)
      Removes the specified callback from the list.
